\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 94059}

\subsection*{Warm and Glowing}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{bear}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 180 mg & oral & MDAI & capsule\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 60 mg & oral & Methiopropamine & capsule\\
\hline
 T+ 3:30 & 100 mg & oral & MDAI & \\
\hline
 T+ 3:30 & 30 mg & oral & Methiopropamine & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 94.00 kg\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Just thought I would share an enjoyable combination and experience. :-)



I'm a fairly experienced user but not overly regular use of various substances.



On this occasion, 1 hour after a light afternoon meal: MDAI 180 mg capsule and MPA 60 mg again in capsule.



Start to feel the come up after around 30-40 minutes. Nice MDAI feeling, warm and waving with the lovely warm feeling but a little more edge and energy from the MPA.



Music and dance was most enjoyable; lots of love; emotion was great feeling.



2.5 hours: feels like peaking



3.5 hours: top up dose MDAI 100mg + MPA 30mg 



The good feelings and energy still there.



In total, 6-7 hours was the main energy of the trip. Pupils very large throughout and a few extra trips to urinate but well worth the side effects.



At 8-9 hours pupils still not fully recovered but definite coming down. It's warm and glowing and clear headed. Fell to sleep for 3 hours and was up ready to work with plenty of energy pupils back to normal.

\end{document}
